actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To adjust the boundary of the Carson National Forest, New Mexico.
short_title: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act

summary.text: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act - Adjusts the boundary of the Carson National Forest in New Mexico to incorporate approximately 4,990 acres of land identified as the Miranda Canyon Boundary on the map entitled "Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment" and dated September 21, 2010.

titles.title: Carson National Forest Boundary Adjustment Act
To adjust the boundary of the Carson National Forest, New Mexico.
